程序包 com.shapeville.gui.tasks

接口 TaskPanelInterface

所有已知实现类:
AngleCalculationPanel, AreaCalculationPanel, BaseTaskPanel, CircleCalculationPanel, CompoundShapeCalculationPanel, SectorCalculationPanel, ShapePanel
public interface TaskPanelInterface
Interface defining the core functionality for task panels in the Shapeville application. This interface provides methods for managing the lifecycle of a task panel and retrieving task status information. Task panels implementing this interface should handle: - Task lifecycle (start, pause, resume, end) - Score tracking and reporting - User feedback generation
从以下版本开始:
2024-05-01
版本:
1.0
作者:
Ye Jin, Jian Wang, Zijie Long, Tianyun Zhang, Xianzhi Dong

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    endTask()
    Ends the current task and performs cleanup.
    String
    getFeedback()
    Gets feedback about the task's current state or completion.
    int
    getScore()
    Gets the current score for the task.
    void
    pauseTask()
    Pauses the current task.
    void

    Resumes a paused task.
    void
    startTask()
    Starts the task and initializes necessary components.

  • 方法详细资料

    • startTask

      void startTask()
      Starts the task and initializes necessary components. This method should be called when the task panel is first displayed or when restarting a task.

    • pauseTask

      void pauseTask()
      Pauses the current task. This method should temporarily suspend any ongoing operations, timers, or user interactions.

    • resumeTask

      void resumeTask()
      Resumes a paused task. This method should restore the task state and resume any suspended operations or timers.

    • endTask

      void endTask()
      Ends the current task and performs cleanup. This method should handle final score calculation, resource cleanup, and any necessary state updates.

    • getScore

      int getScore()
      Gets the current score for the task.
      返回:
      The current score value

    • getFeedback

      String getFeedback()
      Gets feedback about the task's current state or completion.
      返回:
      A string containing feedback about the task
